BattleEffectText.Name: Midnight Fixer 1's Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Midnight Office Fixer 1's Keypage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Ethan's Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Ethan's Keypage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Turner's Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Alexander Turner's Keypage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Inferno Templar's Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of the Inferno Corps Templar's Keypage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Inferno Runt's Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of the Inferno Corps Underrunt's Keypage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Susano'o's Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Susano'o's Keypage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Flow State
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increase minimum and maximum roll value of all dice by +1.

BattleEffectText.Name: Cycle
BattleEffectText.Desc: Upon using a page, discard 1 random page, then draw 1 page, then lose 1 Cycle.

BattleEffectText.Name: Overheat
BattleEffectText.Desc: {0} Speed dice become unusable. This character's rightmost Speed die cannot become unusable from this effect. Lose 1 Stack at the end of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Samsara
BattleEffectText.Desc: Used in order to use Speed Break.

BattleEffectText.Name: Speed Break
BattleEffectText.Desc: Moving faster than visible motion.

BattleEffectText.Name: Lightning Orb
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, deal 3 damage to a random enemy. If this Orb is Evoked, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.

BattleEffectText.Name: Frost Orb
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, gain 3 Shield. If this Orb is Evoked, gain 7 Shield.

BattleEffectText.Name: Darkness Orb
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, gain 3 Malice. If this Orb is Evoked, deal 6 damage to the enemy with the lowest HP.

BattleEffectText.Name: Plasma Orb
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain +1 Max Light Capacity. At the start of the Scene, restore 1 Light. If this Orb is Evoked, restore 2 Light at the start of the next Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Focus
BattleEffectText.Desc: Lightning Orbs deal +{0} additional damage. Frost Orbs gain +{0} additional Shield. Gain +{0} additional Malice from Darkness Orbs, and deal +{0} additional damage with Darkness Orbs.

BattleEffectText.Name: Malice
BattleEffectText.Desc: When Evoking a Darkness Orb, it deals +{0} additional damage. After Evoking a Darkness Orb, lose all Malice.

BattleEffectText.Name: Locked On
BattleEffectText.Desc: All enemies' Lightning Orbs deal damage to this character instead of dealing damage randomly. Only 1 character can be Locked On at a time. At the end of the Scene, lose Locked On.

BattleEffectText.Name: Cycle
BattleEffectText.Desc: Upon using a page, discard 2 random pages, then draw 2 pages, then lose 1 Cycle.

BattleEffectText.Name: Spare Parts
BattleEffectText.Desc: Affects the properties of certain Combat Pages. Stacks up to 10.

BattleEffectText.Name: Spare Parts
BattleEffectText.Desc: Affects the properties of certain Combat Pages. Stacks up to 25.

BattleEffectText.Name: Ink
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take {0} more Stagger damage from attacks. At the end of the Scene, take {0}/4 Stagger damage (Rounded Down) and lose 1 stack of Ink. If Ink is 10 or higher, Defensive Dice gain +1 Power.

BattleEffectText.Name: Spore
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, take {0} damage and halve the stack. (Rounds down) Take {0} damage every time the character rolls an Offensive die.

BattleEffectText.Name: Burn Protection
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take {1}% less damage from Burn, up to 100%. Lose 1 stack at the end of the Scene. Can be stacked up to 11.

BattleEffectText.Name: Thunderstruck
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the duration of the Scene, all dice played by this character gain a {1}% chance to lose 2 Power. Can be stacked up to 10.

BattleEffectText.Name: Thunderstruck X
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the duration of the Scene, all dice played by this character gain a (X * 10)% chance to lose 2 Power. Can be stacked up to 10.

BattleEffectText.Name: Stored Chems
BattleEffectText.Desc: Affects the properties of certain Combat Pages.
